column5: All I have to say is I told ya so to all you Pats fans out there!! HAHAHA Way to go Giants!

I tried telling the same thing to people last week. No one would believe me.   Go figure they should know I'm never wrong. Once I thought I was wrong, but I was mistaken. I figured if the could beat my team the Packers they were unstoppable.
..and naturally you guys were so confident in your predictions you placed huge wagers and today you're rich!
That's nothing. I predicted last weekends 649 numbers. But like you, I forgot to bet.
Where were all you genius prognosticators before my first wedding?
I'm not a betting person but had someone put $1,000. on the Giants 5 games away from the bowl and let it ride, they'd be up $32,000. today.
